fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2025e1.equipments.hairdryer

Interface HairDryerImplementationI

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    HairDryerUserCI
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    HairDryer, HairDryerConnector, HairDryerInboundPort, HairDryerOutboundPort

    public interface HairDryerImplementationI
    The interface HairDryerImplementationI defines the signatures of services service implemented by the hair dryer component.

    Description

    Invariants

     invariant       true        // no invariant

    Created on : 2023-09-19

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant

      static class  HairDryerImplementationI.HairDryerMode
      The enumeration HairDryerMode describes the operation modes of the hair dryer.
      static class  HairDryerImplementationI.HairDryerState
      The enumeration HairDryerState describes the operation states of the hair dryer.

      set the hair dryer in high mode.

      set the hair dryer in low mode.
      void turnOff()
      turn off the hair dryer.
      void turnOn()
      turn on the hair dryer, put in the low temperature and slow fan mode.
